long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QuickUp takes the task of simple writing and elevates it to a compact, friendly and accessible service. With QuickUp you can easily access your notes in the top-right corner of your Chrome window without worrying about split-screening, having multiple windows open, or saving your work. QuickUp's notes interface is well-versed and has a collection of different themes, features, and rich-text editor features. Overall, QuickUp is essential for a swift way to keep track of notes, dates, or more.
